subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn crashed and broke her pinkie. Her accident was also a setback for teammate Julia Mancuso, who followed her. The second run was postponed.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn crashed and broke her pinkie. Her accident was also a setback for teammate Julia Mancuso, who followed her. The second run was postponed.
